com.kkyria16.util

Class Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kkyria16.util.Downloader

  • public class Downloader
extends java.lang.Object
    Downloader This is a program designed in order to download single .zip files from a certain download link. Designed for future integrated download feature of all projects on GitHub of LicenseCrawler.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kyriakos Kyriakou
